meat_grill_mix.name: Mixed Grill Plate
meat_grill_mix.short: Grilled pork, chicken and beef selection.
meat_grill_mix.description: A hearty grill plate with pork, chicken and beef, served with herb butter and a side dish. Perfect for meat lovers.

meat_beef_steak.name: Beef Steak
meat_beef_steak.description: A tender and juicy beef steak grilled to medium perfection. Rich flavor and ideal texture.

meat_chicken_fillet.name: Chicken Fillet
meat_chicken_fillet.short: Grilled chicken fillet with herb marinade.
meat_chicken_fillet.description: Juicy chicken fillet marinated in herbs and gently grilled. Light, flavorful and nutritious.

meat_pork_ribs.name: BBQ Spareribs
meat_pork_ribs.short: Tender ribs glazed in BBQ sauce.
meat_pork_ribs.description: Slow-cooked pork ribs glazed in smoky BBQ sauce. Tender, juicy and packed with flavor.

meat_beef_burger.name: Beef Burger
meat_beef_burger.short: Beef patty burger with salad and tomatoes.
meat_beef_burger.description: Classic beef burger with a juicy patty, fresh salad, tomatoes and a light sauce. A modern restaurant favorite.

meat_cordon_bleu.name: Cordon Bleu
meat_cordon_bleu.short: Breaded schnitzel filled with cheese and ham.
meat_cordon_bleu.description: Crispy breaded pork schnitzel filled with ham and melted cheese. A classic, hearty and satisfying dish.
